page.title: 16WOODHOUSES FUN RUN
page.content: Mr. Wood's day began early Sunday 3rd July at 7.OO am with his normal cellar work-bleaching the floor and cleaning the pipes. Then bunting had to be put around the pub. It was the 3RD annual Woodhouses Fun Run, over a distance of 3.75 miles. { Runners started arriving by 9.30 am {some in fancy dress. Mr. Wood washed, {shaved, checked with the police over {cover for the event and then prepared {for the major.Large crowds gathered {in the car park to watch the 210 {competitors. The race finished in {record time (19.01 mins) and drinks {and sandwiches were provided. Mr. Wood served behind the bar from 12.00 - 2.00 pm without a break. Then the only family meal of the week was enjoyed before opening time again at 7 Mr. Wood's day ended late after swilling, hosing and checking the till
